MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 19-OCT-2020 06:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: This is a message for customers in the LL15 postcode area of Denbigh. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3AM due to repairs required on faulty equipment on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6AM. We will make every effort to contact you if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:35AM on 19 October 2020.
